summary: $COPE on Ethereum - COPE takes the iconic Pepe the Frog character and combines it with the concept of coping, often depicted with a humorous twist. In this meme, Pepe is typically portrayed in a state of distress or frustration, accompanied by text or imagery indicating various coping mechanisms. These coping mechanisms can range from humorous distractions to exaggerated reactions, reflecting the diverse ways people deal with challenges or stress in their lives
